name: Shooting Fever - Basketball Arcade 2016 For Free
name_original: Shooting Fever - Basketball Arcade 2016 For Free
description:
Shooting Fever is an innovative new basketball arcade game you've never seen before!
The goal is shooting as fast as you can! Extremely fast paced game!
I am sure this will put you into mania!

How to Play
*Swipe your finger on the screen to throw basketballs out
*Score to add extra time
*Miss to lose time
*Perfect shot gives you much extra time
*How many scores can you achieve?


Game Feature
*Simple and pretty graphics
*Time sensitive game play which makes the game very challenging
*Easy to play, Hard to master
